column5: Hi there,  Is anyone using casitng spoon nowaday to catch panfish? Usually angler using plastic instead of spoon. Yesterday I saw a guy using small casting spoon and he end up getting 2 walleyes and some white perch and white bass.  Thanks!
I always have a spoon tied on for panfish.  I will also have a jig and a grub or tube on another rod and a 3rd rod will be a slip float rig.
Yup  Casting small flutter spoons and letting them drop,then jerking them and repeating has done me well.
